Name: Mushrooms
Notes: A canon for John Cage to a poem by Sylvia Plath. The single letters of the poem are used to create each of the 9 x 3 voices of this canon.
Long Description: A canon for John Cage to a poem by Sylvia Plath. The single letters of the poem are used to create each of the 9 x 3 voices of this canon.
Short Description: A canon for John Cage to a poem by Sylvia Plath.
